data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Xing, Ji-Chun, Li, Zi-Zhong (2014): First record of the leafhopper genus Soractellus Evans, 1966 (Hemiptera: Cicadellidae: Deltocephalinae) from China, with description of a new species. Zootaxa 3784 (3): 297-300, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3784.3.10
